alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Furnas County through 600 PM CDT... At 526 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hollinger, or 26 miles north of Norton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Edison around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
